attributes.action: TOTALLY reform the Tax laws.  We only earn our wages ONCE, so only tax that wage ONCE and not again on what we spend it on, again on what we save for, again on what we leave to our kids, again on putting a roof over our heads...the list goes on and on.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I wish our country would lead the way and adopt a one-time tax regime.  Tax on wages from employment only.  Simple.
